meanings.definition: A blanket or quilt used to cover a bed.
meanings.sent1: I snuggled under the warm bedcovering on a cold night.
meanings.sent2: She folded the bedcovering neatly at the foot of the bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the bedcovering was a great place to hide.
meanings.sent4: The bedcovering was a soft cloud enveloping me in comfort.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bedcovering added a cheerful touch to the room.

meanings.definition: The act of covering a bed with a bedcovering.
meanings.sent1: After making the bed, she smoothed out the bedcovering.
meanings.sent2: His favorite part of bedtime was arranging the bedcovering just right.
meanings.sent3: The bedcovering dance involved twirling around the room with a sheet.
meanings.sent4: She performed a magic trick, making the bedcovering appear with a flourish.
meanings.sent5: The bedcovering ceremony marked the end of the day in their household.
